about_the_game:
Grisù Tales from Dragontown: The Game That Brings the Adventures of Grisù to Your PC!

Discover the fantastic world of Grisù Tales from Dragontown, an exciting PC game designed to entertain children and relive the exciting adventures of the most beloved dragon of all time, Grisù! Inspired by the famous TV series, this game allows you to explore Dragontown and experience first-hand the adventures of the little dragon with a big dream: to become a firefighter.

Four Intuitive and Fun Game Modes:


  • Racing: Challenge yourself in breathtaking races through the paths of Dragontown! Guide Grisù in exciting races and prove you are the fastest dragon in the city.
  • Photoshooting: Take incredible photos during Grisù's adventures! Capture the funniest moments and create your own personalized album, full of memories from the TV series.
  • Recovery: Help Grisù recover precious objects scattered around Dragontown! Test your research and problem-solving skills to complete each mission successfully.
  • Exploration: Freely explore Dragontown and discover all the hidden secrets of the city. Interact with the canonical characters of the series and live new adventures every time you play!

A Unique Experience with Original Scenes from the TV Series:


Grisù Tales from Dragontown is not just a game, but an interactive journey into the world of Grisù. With original scenes from the TV series, children will be able to fully immerse themselves in the stories and adventures of their favorite dragon, meeting all the canonical characters that have made the series famous.

Perfect for Kids of All Ages:


With its intuitive modes and gameplay suitable for all ages, Grisù Tales from Dragontown is the ideal game to entertain and stimulate the imagination of the little ones, offering hours of fun and learning.

Join Grisù and his friends in Grisù Tales from Dragontown and be part of an unforgettable adventure!
